instructions: Please walk to the kitchen.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Press the 'Next' button when you reach the kitchen.
Please take a plate out from the kitchen cabinet as shown.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Press the 'Next' button when you are done.
Please take out any food item from the refrigerator.
Unpack the food item.
Place the food item on the plate in the kitchen.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Press the 'Next' button when you are done.
Place the plate with food in the microwave oven.
Wait for few seconds
Take food out of the microwave oven and place it on the slab.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Press the 'Next' button when you are done.
Take a cup out from kitchen cabinet.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Press the 'Next' button when you are done.
Take a drink out from the refrigerator.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Press the 'Next' button when you are done.
Pour the drink into the cup.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Press the 'Next' button when you are done.

8.activityName: Walk to table and simulate eating
instructions: Take the food and drink to the dining table.
Simulate eating and drinking (optional).
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Press the 'Next' button when you are done.

9.activityName: Place the items on the sink
instructions: Place the plate and cup into the kitchen sink.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Press the 'Next' button when you are done.
Walk over to the couch and be seated.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Press the 'Next' button when you are done.

11.activityName: Place the Massimo device in your fingertips
instructions: Place the Massimo device in your fingertips.
Please insert your finger completely into the device.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Press the 'Next' button when you are done.
Watch the video running on the screen.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Continue for 2 minutes.
Take a magazine or book from the table.
Continue to read the magazine for 1 minute.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Place the magazine back to the table after 1 minute.
13.alertUserSuccessText: Activity Complete. Place the magazine back to the table and press 'Next'.

instructions: Remove the Massimo device from your fingers
Place the Massimo device on the table
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Press the 'Next' button when you are done.
Walk to the bathroom.
The activities performed in the bathroom can be simulated.
Please be careful not to actually use the facilities in the bathroom.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Press the 'Next' button when you are done.
Simulate taking off the shirt.
Please move inside the shower cabinet.
Simulate the motion of showering for 2 minutes
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
The app will alert you when 2 minutes has elapsed.
Please move out of the shower cabinet and walk to the wash basin.
Simulate the motion of brushing your teeth naturally.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Press the 'Next' button when you are done
Please continue this activity in the wash basin.
Simulate the motion of washing your face naturally.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Press the 'Next' button when you are done
Please walk on to the toilet seat.
Please simulate using the toilet.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Press the 'Next' button when you are done
Please walk to the wash basin.
Simulate washing hands.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Press the 'Next' button when you are done
Please walk to the bedroom
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Press the 'Next' button when you are done
Please look for laundry basket near the bedroom door.
Take out a towel from the basket and move to the bedroom closet.
Open the closet door and hang up the towel in any one of the hangers
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Press the 'Next' button when you are done

23.activityName: Fold towel and place it in the cabinet
instructions: Please walk back to the laundry basket.
Take out another towel from the basket and move to the bedroom closet.
Fold the towel.
Open the closet door and place the towel inside the closet.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Press the 'Next' button when you are done
Please walk towards the bed in the bedroom.
Take a seat and remove your shoes.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Press the 'Next' button when you are done
Please put on the Massimo device placed on the bed.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Press the 'Next' button when you are done

26.activityName: Lie down in bed facing ceiling
instructions: Please lie down in the bed facing the ceiling.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Continue this for 5 minutes.
The app will alert you when 5 minutes has elapsed.
26.alertUserSuccessText: Activity Complete. Please press 'Next' to move onto the next posture.

27.activityName: Lie down in bed on your stomach
instructions: Please change your posture.
Lie down in bed on your stomach.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Continue this for 5 minutes.
The app will alert you when 5 minutes has elapsed.
27.alertUserSuccessText: Activity Complete. Please press 'Next' to move onto the next posture.

28.activityName: Lie down in bed on your side
instructions: Please change your posture.
Lie down in bed on your side.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Continue this for 5 minutes.
The app will alert you when 5 minutes has elapsed.
28.alertUserSuccessText: Activity Complete. Please press 'Next' to move onto the next posture.

instructions: Please get up from your position.
Remove the device and place it on the bed.
You can wear your shoes back.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Press 'Next' when you are done.
Please walk to the study table outside the bedroom and be seated in the chair.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Press 'Next' when you have reached.
Please look for a Massimo device on the table.
Put on the device on your fingertips as before.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Press 'Next' when you are done.
Please use the laptop for surfing the internet or performing any other activity
Continue this for 3 minutes.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
The app will alert you when 3 minutes has elapsed.
32.alertUserSuccessText: Activity Complete. Please press 'Next' to move onto the next activity.

instructions: Please remove the Massimo device and place it on the desk.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Press the 'Next' button when you are done.
Please walk to the kitchen near the kitchen sink.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Press the 'Next' button when you have reached.
Please simulate washing the dishes.
Dry out your hands after washing.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Press the 'Next' button when you have reached.
Please walk out to the door and exit the lab.
This is the final step of this experiment.
Press 'Start' when you are ready.
Press the 'Done' button when you have reached.
We thank you for the corporation!
